item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Michelle add a quote by A.A. Milne
Michelle add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Michelle add a quote by John Churton Collins
item.description: "In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends." -- John Churton Collins

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Michelle add a quote by George Herbert
item.description: "The best mirror is an old friend." -- George Herbert

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "So long as we love we serve; so long as we are loved by others, I would almost say that we are indispensable; and no man is useless while he has a friend." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "A faithful friend is a strong defense; And he that hath found him hath found a treasure." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Geraldine Brooks
item.description: "To know a man's library is, in some measure, to know a man's mind." -- Geraldine Brooks
